data.name: Horror Legends - Nightmare Punkie Skins
data.detailed_description:
Unlocks the Nightmare Punkie skin for Human Punkie with 5 skin variants.

"When Ryan enters the Dream Realm she unknowingly unlocks a traumatic memory from her past, manifesting itself within the Dream Realm. What once was buried deep in her subconscious, now stalks her to finish what it started all those years ago.”

Features

  • Nightmare Punkie
  • Bedsore
  • Soul-eater
  • The Damned
  • Reaper
  • Devil

data.short_description: Unlocks the Nightmare Punkie skin for Human Punkie with 5 skin variants.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher; 64 bit version
  • Processor: Intel i5-4790K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 2 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-4790K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 2 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 8 GB available space
